title: Transcript: Fed Chief Powell's Postmeeting Press Conference

Mr. Powell also said central bank officials are prepared to do more to try to bring inflation down to their 2% target if warranted. Additionally, he said the U.S. banking system remains resilient despite its recent turmoil. Here is a transcript of his remarks.

description: The software company’s move to let go about 600 employees follows a recent string of job cuts in the tech industry and beyond.

title: Australian Services Sector Activity Surging Back to Life
description: Activity in Australia’s services sector surged at the fastest pace in a year in April, adding to recent evidence that the economy retains plenty of momentum despite 11 interest rate increases since May last year.
